front.title: Using Self-defined Sub-TLVs for Agile Service Deployment

abstract.t: This document proposes a TLV within the body of the OSPF Router Information (RI) Opaque LSA, called Self-defined Sub-TLV Container TLV. Here the term OSPF means both OSPFv2 and OSPFv3.This attribute is meant to accommodate policy-based and deployment-specific use cases.
